alert.note: Alert for Middle Tanana Valley; Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 24 at 1:59PM AKDT until July 24 at 2:15PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM AKDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MIDDLE TANANA VALLEY AND SOUTHWESTERN YUKON FLATS AND SURROUNDING UPLANDS... At 159 PM AKDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 29 miles west of Twelvemile Summit, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Middle Tanana Valley and southwestern Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Middle Tanana Valley; Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands
